body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Enchant rancor to a creature
2. Get creature to leave the battlefield(to graveyard)
3. See rancor return from graveyard message What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Rancor to return to my hand/rancor staying in the graveyard What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.43 win7 x64 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [sarpk...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/101370706045729318272/)
title: Rancor does not return to hand

comments.body:
Thanks for catching this. Fixed for next release (1.44) to be out this weekend.

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [sarpk...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/101370706045729318272/) on November 29, 2013 04:46:58_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Enchant rancor to a creature
2. Get creature to leave the battlefield(to graveyard)
3. See rancor return from graveyard message What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Rancor to return to my hand/rancor staying in the graveyard What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.43 win7 x64 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
